post:
**[SmallWeb](https://smallweb.net "SmallWeb")** Ltd. was established with the aim of providing affordable low-cost web hosting services  without drawbacks in service quality. We implement efficient cost-cutting strategies to ensure we can maintain an increasing profit whilst also passing the savings on to our customers.

[We launched our new website design](https://smallweb.net/blog/smallwebs-new-website/ "We launched our new website design") recently using a fresh new template by Colorlib. Hope ya like! 

**Our Shared Hosting Locations:**
We are a UK based company but with a global reach. We have locations in 8 different countries.
* **Amsterdam, Netherlands** - Intel Xeon, SSD, CloudLinux 8, Apache 
* **Germany, Europe** - AMD Ryzen, NVMe, CentOS 8, Apache 
* **Los Angeles, United States** - AMD Ryzen, NVMe, CloudLinux 7, Apache 
* **London, United Kingdom** - AMD Epyc, SSD, CloudLinux 7, Apache 
* **Luxembourg, Europe** - Intel Xeon, SSD, CentOS 8, Apache 
* **Melbourne, Australia** - Intel Xeon, NVMe, CloudLinux 7, Apache 
* **New York, United States** - Intel Xeon, SSD, CentOS 8, Apache 
* **Singapore, Asia** - Intel Xeon, NVMe, CloudLinux 7, LiteSpeed 

---

<center>

We are currently offering **50% OFF** our **1GB** and **2GB** shared plans until May 24th. Code: **HALF**



---

Our hosting plans utilise the DirectAdmin control panel with Let's Encrypt and Softaculous.
</center>
